metadata.name: GREED
metadata.description:
...a man in a suit rides a Komodo Dragon through the streets of Lagos, Nigeria..  
This work is embodying the insatiable desire for wealth and power that has driven humanity throughout history. From the gold rush to the stock market, greed has shaped the course of civilization, inspiring both greatness and destruction. This piece tries to capture the raw energy and dangerous allure of this primal impulse, inviting viewers to reflect on their own relationship with money and material possessions.
